The decision for Larry Page to take off the CEO training wheels comes at an auspicious moment in the history of Google. I won't overdramatize this step by saying ''Google is at a crossroads'' or The company's future hangs in the balance. But at no time since the Google juggernaut began its conquest of the Internet have their been so many doubts being raised about the company's future.
